---
title: "Bits n Bio Compendium"
subtitle: "A community-led effort to explain complex bio/tech topics without the fluff."
---

The Bits in Bio (BiB) Compendium is an ongoing educational initiative that provides clear, accessible explanations of key bioinformatics and techbio topics. It’s designed for “bio-curious” or “tech-curious” professionals—people with technical or biological backgrounds  who want to understand the opposite side of the techbio spectrum.
